selected_quotes: Is the Use of Oral Contraceptives Associated With Operatively Treated Anterior Cruciate Ligament Injury?
#Mujer El uso de anticonceptivos orales ayuda a prevenir las lesiones de #LCA
Benefits of the birth control pill: less #breast disease, less #ovary and #uterus #cancer...and now stronger knees
Can oral contraceptive use influence risk of ACL injury in females? I will have to read this one more closely. #ACL

citation.abstract: The incidence of anterior cruciate ligament (ACL) injuries is 2 to 9 times higher in women than in men. In addition, in vitro studies have demonstrated that ACL is an estrogen target tissue, and some studies have therefore suggested a protective association between oral contraceptives (OC) and the likelihood of sustaining ACL injury.
citation.title: Is the Use of Oral Contraceptives Associated With Operatively Treated Anterior Cruciate Ligament Injury? A Case-Control Study From the Danish Knee Ligament Reconstruction Registry

facebook.title: Is the Use of Oral Contraceptives Associated With Operatively Treated Anterior Cruciate Ligament...
facebook.summary:
USO DI CONTRACCETTIVI ORALI E ROTTURA DEL LEGAMENTO CROCIATO ANTERIORE
Un recente studio epidemiologico danese ha dimostrato che l'assunzione di contracettivi orali riduce il rischio nelle femmine di andare incontro a rottura del ligamento crociato anterio
